resources.string:
The other party has all the information about the company. I am
sure that someone is passing the information. In this situation I
am sure that they will win the bid this time.

Its not good. However, we follow what is good for us. We have
the best product. If the company seeks for the good, we are here.

Please be in queue. We have been standing here for hours and
how could you try to ignore us and directly go in front.

I don\’t have to be in queue. I am the brother of the officer
receiving the bill inside. I can pay my bill to him in his cabin.

I am feeling sorry I couldn\’t help the lady. She was crying for
help. The thief took away her bag who just passed by me.
